short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate WhatsApp links from phone numbers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily generate WhatsApp links from phone numbers! This simple extension allows you to quickly create a WhatsApp link by entering any phone number. Just input the number, and the extension will format it correctly for WhatsApp, removing any spaces, hyphens, or other non-digit characters. Once the link is generated, you can click to open WhatsApp or share the link directly.

Features:

Automatically formats phone numbers to be compatible with WhatsApp.
Generates a clickable link to start a WhatsApp chat.
Simple and user-friendly interface.
Supports various phone number formats, including numbers with spaces, hyphens, and parentheses.
Perfect for anyone who needs to quickly connect with contacts on WhatsApp!
